output.dependency: The value in the first column, representing a unique identifier for each film, semantically determines the film title in the second column.
The film title in the second column semantically determines the genre of the film in the fourteenth column, indicating that all these titles belong in the horror genre.
The year of release in the second column appears to be associated with the release date or relevant information in the third column, where applicable.
The director represented in the fourth column seems to correlate with the writers listed in the fifth column, indicating a relationship between who directed and who wrote the film.
The primary cast in the sixth column is likely connected to the full cast in the seventh column, suggesting that the full cast includes those listed in the primary cast.

The country of production in the ninth column may determine the information in the third column regarding the specific release dates mentioned, as common practice links the country to its release information.
The filming location described in the fifteenth column might provide contextual information about the film's narrative, as described in the second column.
